comments.author: Matt
comments.body: I'm an unfaithful Frend. I took a late lunch today to shop for a new apartment. It looks like tomorrow may be out, too. Sorry guys!

comments.author: Dave
comments.body: Glad I got out today, even tho' it was hideously hot. The trails are so dry they're slick... like running on ball bearings. I hate summer... except the [Eban Fine swimming hole](http://www.colby.edu/personal/a/ampaliye/FR252/manet20.jpg) part. That part's fine 'n dandy.
